questions.question: A merchant needs to be able to weigh any whole number of pounds from 1 pound to 121 pounds using a balance scale. What is the minimum number of weights he needs, and what should their values be, assuming weights can be placed on either side of the scale?

What should come in place of the question mark (?)?
Series: 10, 16.5, 35, 90, 273, ?

The Mango Thieves: Three boys steal a basket of mangoes containing fewer than 100 fruits. That night, the first boy wakes up, gives one mango to a monkey, and takes exactly 1/3 of the remainder. The second boy does the same, followed by the third. In the morning, they find that the number of remaining mangoes is again one more than a multiple of three. How many mangoes were originally in the basket?
Poor people have it. Rich people need it. If you eat it you die. What is it?

What should come in place of the question mark (?)?
Series: 14, 25, 47, 91, 179, ?
